topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55938f896368723ab100074d#post_55938f896368723ab100074d
Of course it's fake; look at the bit where they're applying the new poster at the parts where the new poster and the old poster meet: doesn't it look odd?  Whenever a image is photoshopped no matter how well done it is your eye can notice it if you look close enough.
